vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of  the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Package A Project (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - XIT Paving & Construction, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of three - Not to exceed $11,564,976.75 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Fund ($4,545,532.05), Equity Fund ($3,999,999.70) Water Capital Improvement G Fund ($1,690,462.00), Water Construction Fund ($93,228.00), Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($1,189,014.00), and Wastewater Construction Fund ($46,741.00)
